-- | Scrap Your Boilerplate With Class Text instance
--   
--   Provides SYB-with-class instances for Text from the text package.
@package syb-with-class-instances-text
@version 0.0.1

module Data.Generics.SYB.WithClass.Instances.Text
instance (Data ctx String, Sat (ctx Text)) => Data ctx Text
instance (Data ctx String, Sat (ctx Text)) => Data ctx Text
